title: How to Make Minty Oreo Lollipops

steps.headline: Take the Mint Oreos and twist apart.
Melt your chocolate chips in the microwave until fully melted, then stir.
Take your craft sticks and dip one end into the melted chocolate chips.
Press each side of a split Oreo onto the stick.
Take the Oreo sticks out of the freezer after 15 minutes.
Dip each Oreo stick into the chocolate chip melt.
Place each on a Styrofoam plate and let it dry.
Wrap the clear wrap around the Oreo stick and secure it with the ribbon.

text: Take the Mint Oreos and twist apart.  Melt your chocolate chips in the microwave until fully melted, then stir.  Take your craft sticks and dip one end into the melted chocolate chips.  Press each side of a split Oreo onto the stick.  Freeze the Oreo sticks.  Take the Oreo sticks out of the freezer after 15 minutes.  Dip each Oreo stick into the chocolate chip melt.  Place each on a Styrofoam plate and let it dry.  Wrap the clear wrap around the Oreo stick and secure it with the ribbon.  Finished.
